task:
Design and implement Source UI - a comprehensive, beautiful system management dashboard for OpenClaw.

## Vision
Source UI should be a testament to collaborative engineering - a beautiful, functional control center that launches with the gateway and provides full agent orchestration.

## Architecture Requirements
1. **Self-hosting web app** that runs as part of OpenClaw system
2. **Service-based architecture**: Separate components for each domain
3. **Real-time updates** via WebSocket connections to gateway
4. **Modular design** - easy to add new features
5. **Production-ready** - error handling, logging, graceful degradation

## Core Features

### 1. Task Management
- Kanban-style board (Backlog → In Progress → Review → Done)
- Drag-and-drop task reordering
- Priority levels with visual indicators
- Task details panel with full context
- Create/edit/delete tasks
- Task templates for common operations
- Filter by status, priority, assignee

### 2. Agent Orchestration
- Visual agent cards with real-time status
- Resource usage per agent (CPU, memory, tokens)
- Start/stop/pause/resume controls
- Agent configuration panel
- Multi-agent workflow visualization
- Agent activity timeline

### 3. Schedule Management
- Interactive calendar (month/week/day views)
- Cron expression builder with human-readable descriptions
- Drag-to-reschedule events
- Upcoming jobs timeline
- Job history with success/failure rates
- Quick-add scheduled tasks

### 4. System Health Dashboard
- Real-time metrics (CPU, memory, disk, GPU)
- Component status grid (Gateway, VLLM, Telegram, Memory)
- Health history graphs
- Alert thresholds with notifications
- Quick actions (restart, clear cache, etc.)

### 5. Activity & Notifications
- Real-time activity feed
- Notification center with read/unread
- Filter by type (info, success, warning, error)
- Desktop notifications support

### 6. Command Palette
- Cmd+K to open
- Fuzzy search for commands
- Recent commands
- Keyboard shortcuts throughout

## UI/UX Requirements
- Dark theme as default (with light toggle)
- Responsive design (desktop-first, works on tablet)
- Smooth animations (60fps)
- Skeleton loaders for async content
- Toast notifications
- Modal system
- Consistent design language

## Technical Stack
- Single-page app with vanilla JS or lightweight framework
- CSS custom properties for theming
- LocalStorage for preferences
- WebSocket for real-time updates (or polling fallback)
- REST API integration with OpenClaw gateway

## File Structure


## Integration
- Should be servable from gateway (add route or static file)
- Or run on separate port with proxy
- Auto-start via systemd service or gateway hook

This should be BEAUTIFUL, functional, and a true testament to what's possible when humans and agents work together. Take your time, get it right.
